title: Research Guides: Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM): Website
author: Sara Hoover
description: Research Guides: Complementary and Alternative Medicine (CAM): Website
cleaned_text: The National Center for Complementary and Alternative Medicine (NCCAM) is the Federal Government's lead agency for scientific research on complementary and alternative medicine (CAM). FDA: Alternative Medicine Fraud The following information reflects enforcement actions taken by the Agency to protect consumers from fraudulent alternative medicine products.
